channel.title: How do i get rid of laughing man bot
channel.description: okay, so i've been having to shut my server off every now and then cuz of this laughing man dick head, his website is http://laughingmansociety.net/ and look at the footer, it says bots were sent out today. he uses an alt code at the end of his name so u can't ban him or anything. how do i stop him from coming back? :confused: :confused: :| :|

item.title: How do i get rid of laughing man bot
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:12, topic:281480”]add a dialogue to the starter command, thats how u stop him as i posted in the other help topic

-best way to stop him and he gay ip-changing shit-

also, that site is down, i would like to see the list
how far up am i on it :)[/quote]
what’s a dialogue?

item.title: How do i get rid of laughing man bot
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

Laughing Man’s cause is just, in my opinion. The only ones who will be able to block it are those with sufficient programming knowledge, because if a fix were to be posted publicly he could simply reroute his attacks. Leaving all the people who download and run a server to call it their own out of luck, because those of us who find a fix don’t plan on publishing it.

item.title: How do i get rid of laughing man bot
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

i just read his message on his forums
he might be reading our posts about him right now
here’s his post
Well what can I say? I appeared back about five months ago and here I am or should I say hear we are. The Laughingman Society is a small group of people with intentions for change.
The one thing that makes this group a threat to anyone is that the bot it self gets reprogrammed every so often. We watch the forums for people who attempt to find a way to block us.
Of course I could come up with a number of ways to block the bot but hell, wheres the fun in that? Our group is always a step ahead of the rs2p server communities. Thus ensuring our immediate success. The bot it’s self requires little or no maintenance at all.

You can contact me at laughingmansyndrome@live.com

~~Laughingman forever.

P.S Theres little chance I’ll take your server off the list even if you beg.

http://laughingmansociety.net/servers.txt[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2009, 06:46:57 pm[/size][hr]one ip connection stuff won’t work, all servers are screwed man! and i just started servers again! >:( i’m fucking taking over that dick head! i’m gonna fuck that fucker up!

Read full topic
